channel.title: Emmanuelfages on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Emmanuelfages on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 is available!
item.description: Dear community, it is a great day for us all. Many “when will it be released?” later, we are thrilled to announce the birth of PrestaShop 1.7.3!

item.title: Stock management in PrestaShop 1.7 - part 4
item.description: In the previous posts, we spoke about our motivations for designing a new stock management system and how we’ve built it in the 1.7.2 release. We also described in depth the features and the technology used in these new interfaces. Now it’s time to tell you about the forthcoming advanced features of stock management!
